mapper.select: select * from mm_product_order where order_state = 5 and order_type = 2 and operator_id=#{operatorId} and user_phone=#{userPhone} and ext4 = #{ext4}

select a.* FROM mm_product_order a, (select max(id) id from mm_product_order where operator_id=#{operatorId} and product_id=#{productId} and pay_end_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY user_phone) b where a.id = b.id and a.order_state in (3, 1) and a.order_type in (1,0)
